Abstract: Henry Fountain article on whether in the century ahead science will succeed in reviving bodies frozen in liquid nitrogen, colonizing outer space, eliminating dust mites, improving fabrics used in clothing and making it impossible to be alone; photos (M)

LeadParagraph: In the next century, will those bodies that have been frozen in liquid nitrogen be brought back to life?

Headline.Main: Will Dust Survive? And Other Nagging Questions
